text: The 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 4 was a qualifying group for the 1990 FIFA World Cup. West Germany and Netherlands were the two teams that qualified. ==Results== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 6 4 2 0 8 2 +6 10 6 3 3 0 13 3 +10 9 6 1 1 4 4 16 –12 3 6 0 2 4 4 8 –4 2 ==Top scorers== ===4 goals=== * Rudi Völler ===2 goals=== * Mika Lipponen * John Bosman * Lothar Matthäus * Andreas Möller * Karl-Heinz Riedle Category:1990 FIFA World Cup qualification (UEFA)
title: 1990 FIFA World Cup qualification – UEFA Group 4
